title: LYON
description: Unisex straight leg trouser woven from a lightweight wool. Lyon features a single pleat at waist and side. Constructed with elastic ribbing at side, it is intended that sizing for Lyon is chosen with reference to the wearers’ height.
modelInfo: Harvey is 179cm (5ft 10”) and wears a size M.

title: COMO
description: Unisex relaxed fit collared pullover knitted from a supple bouclé yarn. Como features an open placket wide point spread collar with a rib-knit at hem and cuffs. Stripe patterning is varied between sizes.
passportHolderNote: Purchases of Como in Limoncello will receive a complimentary 'Time in lieu' exclusive passport holder in the black colourway.
modelInfo: Nick is 191cm (6ft 3”) and wears a size XL.

title: SHION
